name: Biofuel Oxite Dissolver
description: More efficient than the Oxite Dissolver , this is used in tandem with Oxygen Containers placed into the oxidizer. The front slots of the deployable only accept Oxygen Containers and will automatically fill said containers from Oxite placed into the machine when supplied with Biofuel from a Biofuel Can . A full Biofuel Can will last three minutes and twenty seconds, producing 0.2 Liters of Oxygen every two seconds.
